== api ==
* user name -> user
* book key -> tags
* () -> books
* impression key -> (delete)
* [(), user name, book key, date] -> impressions
* () -> login information & user
* text -> book, impressions (search)
* new tags -> updated tags
* tag key -> books
* tag key -> fixed tag (future)
* () -> last message

* book key -> book
* impression key -> impression
	* entity key -> entity
